inn1.comm: outside the off stump, it was wide and signalled wide
drifting on the pads, Trescothick neatly turns it around behind square leg for couple of runs
defends to mid off
defends to the off side, comes nicely on the front foot
good ball on the middle stump, Trescothick this time on the back foot defends back down the track
good length delivery, Trescothick defends with a straight bat to the off side
outside the off stump, signalled wide
back of a length, Strauss defends back down the track
good length delivery, Strauss pushes to mid off
driven off the back foot wide of thirdman to the fence, it was bit short
this time gets the edge to thirdman
a push from Trescothick, goes to the cover fence in quick time, good shot
left alone outside the off stump
comes forward to a good length delivery and defends to cover
edged wide of Jayawardene at first slip, good ball there moving away, Malinga at thirdman fails to stop it, the ball goes into the fence
drives, a thickish edge to backward-point
defended on the back foot to mid on
back of a length outside the off stump, Strauss forces off the back foot to cover
change in pace from Vaas, cuts in off the seam, Strauss lets it go, that surprised him, he thought it would go the other way.
excellent delivery, Trescothick standing in the crease, just feels at the delivery, beats the outside edge.
played behind square to fine leg for a run
fuller length delivery, lets it go
slashes at the delivery, goes on the bounce to thirdman
defended to midwicket
stands tall and defends well to point
fuller delivery outside the off stump, looking to drive through the off side, gets a thickish edge along the ground to backward-point
plays to the on side
comes forward and drives to mid off
good length delivery outside the off stump, Strauss pushes to Jayawardene at cover
on the middle and leg, Strauss plays it in the gap between mid on and midwicket for a single
hint of away swing, Trescothick watches it and lets it go, good take from Sangakkara
cuts it, gets bottom edge to thirdman
forces off the back foot to the off side, Arnold at short point gets an hand to it
good delivery, pitches just outside the leg stump, strikes the pad, loud shout, turned down by Billy doctrove
bit wide, Strauss cuts it to thirdman for a single
Trescothick playing from the crease, pushes to the off side

left alone outside the off stump, fast and quick work from Sangakkara, who takes the ball and whips off the bails, referred to third Umpire for a stumping, NOT OUT comes on the screen, Strauss's foot was in.
pushes off the back foot to backward-point
pushes wide of mid on for a single
drifting on the pads, plays it behind square leg for a single
driven to Malinga at mid on
plays from the crease, Trescothick blocks it, goes to Jayawardene at slip
pushes wide of mid off for a quick single
wide outside the off stump, Trescothick cuts it nicely to cover fence, good shot
beats the outside edge, Fernando oversteps
another cracking cut to cover fence, good shot, bad delivery from Fernando, has been bit wide
steers it down nicely to thirdman for a single
back of a length on the body, Strauss defends from the crease to the off side
pushes off the front foot to Dilshan at point
good length delivery outside the off stump, Trescothick pushes to the off side, Arnold at short point fields the ball
back of a length outside the off stump, Trescothick cuts hard, Dilshan at backward-point dives across to his left and saves a few runs, wonderful stuff
good ball moving away, Strauss cuts and misses, Sangakkara collects it well
a leading edge to mid off, Strauss looking to play to the on side, lucky for him, it was wide of Vaas
on the pads, tucked away to deep backward square leg for a single
on the legs, Strauss turns it away nicely to deep backward square leg, Vaas from fine leg, runs around and fields the ball
good shot from Strauss, it was in the slot, comes nicely on the front foot and drives well in the gap to extra-cover fence
on the legs again, turned away to midwicket for a couple of runs
opens the face off the bat and steers it, quick single taken wide of Dilshan at backward-point, who has a shy at the stumps and misses.
short and bit wide, Trescothick cuts hard, Dilshan again makes a brilliant stop diving to his left, saves a certain boundary.
back of a length, Trescothick with and open face plays behind the wicket, Dilshan quickly in prevents the single.
pushes to the on side
good length delivery outside the off stump, pushes to Arnold at cover
drifting on the pads, tucked it nicely to deep backward square leg for a single
driven back in the air past Vaas, it was hit hard down the ground to the fence, good shot, the Umpire just got of the way.
forces off the back foot to cover
that was close to the off stump, Trescothick looking for the big shot, misses it, change in pace from Vaas, excellent delivery
oversteps, played away to deep backward square leg, Strauss wants the second run, that was a risky second run, referred to the third Umpire for a run out, NOT OUT comes on the screen, Strauss was in.
goes to backward-point, from the outer half off the bat
turned away to the on side
cuts late to thirdman for a single, that was well played by Strauss
Trescothick pushes forward, gets a thickish edge to deep backward square leg, they go through with the single
turned away nicely in front of square leg to the deep, fielded by Bandara
width offered, Trescothick cuts hard but finds Tharanga at point, who makes a half stop, defelects to the deep, saves few runs.
inside edge, the ball just misses the leg stump as it rolled along the ground.
cut away to thirdman for a single
makes a little room and cuts late to thirdman for a single, that was neatly played

Vaas strikes, that was bit fuller on the off and middle, Strauss looking to play to the on side, playing across the line, strikes the pad in line with the stumps, loud appeal, Umpire Benson lifts the finger.
good length delivery, watchfully defended by Bell to the off side
good length delivery, change in pace, Bell on the front foot defends down the track, fielded by Vaas on his follow through.
good shot, sweetly timed, Trescothick drives well in the gap between extra-cover and mid off, ball races to the fence in quick time.
another wonderful shot, driven on the up in the gap, ball races across the turf to extra-cover fence, Trescothick finding the gaps very well
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to thirdman for a single
short of length outside the off stump, plays with an open face to Tharanga at backward-point
fuller delivery, Bell drives down the track, fielded by Maharoof on his follow through
excellent delivery outside the off stump, seams away, Bell looking to steer it down, misses it, Sangakkara takes it behind the stumps
plays it down the thirdman for a single
defended to the off side
fuller delivery, Bell drives well down the ground to long off, Malinga chases well and then puts in a good slide and makes a good save.

Vaas gets his man, picks up Trescothick, excellent delivery, fast and pacy around the off stump, coming in, Trescothick looking to play to the on side, leaves a big gap between bat  and pad, the ball strikes the middle stump.
defended well to the off side
comes forward and drives well to mid off with the full face off the bat, good positive shot.
runs it down to thirdman for a single
back of a length outside the off stump, Pietersen looking to steer it down, beats the outside edge, excellent take from Sangakkara, who is standing up.
defended to point
moves forward and pushes to mid off
DROPPED! short of length, Pietersen steering it down, gets the edge, a tough chance for Sangakkara, who puts it down, the ball goes to thirdman.
played to the on side for a single, a thick edge
back of a length delivery, Bell defends to the on side
defends off the back foot to Malinga
tucked away nicely to deep backward sqaure leg, fielded by Fernando, waited for the delivery and worked it nicely
defends to mid on
pushes softly to mid on and takes off for a quick single, well run there by Bell
full and straight on the stumps, driven nicely back down the track, hits the stumps at the non-striker's end, Malinga failed to get a hand to it.
defended to cover.
good length delivery outside the off stump, Bell comes forward and pushes to mid off
back of a length, Bell waits for the ball and turns it nicely through midwicket, well played
good delivery, Bell defends well with a straight bat down the track
good ball on the stumps, again Bell defends with a straight bat down the track, fielded by Maharoof
defends from the crease to the off side
pushes bit hard to mid off, Jayasuriya fails to pick up the ball, that would have been close.
forces to the off side
down the leg side, Bell fails to get a tickle, goes through to Sangakkara, signalled wide
forces to the off side, Arnold at short extra-cover fields the ball
short and wide, Bell times the shot well, but fails to beat Dilshan at backward-point.
good ball there, changed the pace, Bell pushes forward, gets the edge, Fernando at short fine leg makes a mess of fielding the ball, goes to fine leg
defended to the off side
driven on the up to cover, cannot beat the packed off side
a leg cutter from Maharoof, Pietersen looking to play to the on side, misses it completely
this time he gets it to the on side, played in the air wide of Jayasuriya at midwicket to the fence, good shot
good length delivery, nips in, Pietersen looking to play to the on side, misses it, strikes him hard on the pads, he is down on the ground, looks to have hurt him.
stands tall on the front foot and drives well to mid off
good length delivery, Pietersen defends with a straight bat down the track
short ball around the off stump, Bell across the line and defends it down to offside
good length ball on the off stump, nipping in off the wicket, batsman defends it away to mid-on
short of length ball straying on the pads, batsman flicks it away off his legs to deep square leg
Malinga goes in for an yorker but doesnt get it right, angled down the legside, Pietersen fails to put it away and misses, close call for a wide

Big wicket! short delivery outside off stump, Pietersen tries to smash it away off the back-foot, extra-bounce and ball takes the outside edge and straight to Sangakkara, would have been called a wide had Pietersen not nicked it
drifting down the legside, Collingwood gets bat onto it and ball runs down fine to the fence, good start for Collingwood!
full length ball on the leg stump, Bell flicks it straight to Jayawardene at mid-wicket
short of length ball on the off stump, batsman tries to steer down to thirdman but straight to gully fielder
defended down the wicket
good length ball on the off stump, defended to point
short of length ball on the pads, flicked away wide of the deep square leg fielder for a couple of runs
short ball outside off stump, leg-cutter, batsman tries to cut and gets beaten, just 2 runs of the over
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to point3
full length ball on the middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep square leg
back of length delivery on the stumps, defended to onside
short ball around the off stump, batsman steers it away nicely to thirdman, 100 comes up at the 23rd over
defended on the back-foot to mid-wicket, Malinga concentrating on bowling stump to stump and is doing a good job
fraction short outside off stump, Collingwood fails to put it away for runs, cuts it over the ball, mistimes to point
defended on the front-foot to offside
good ball around the off stump, moving away slightly, batsman beaten on the front-foot
pushed off the front-foot to offside. Sri Lankans keeping them under pressure with tight bowling
good length ball on the off stump, driven on the front-foot to extra-cover
short of length ball on the off stump, defended with an angled bat wide of the backward point fielder
short ball outside off stump, Bell looks to drive off the back-foot but mistimes, ball rolls down to offside, Bell not happy with the stroke
not a good start, straying onto the pads, flicked away beautifully through mid-wicket, ball doesnt take to the fence and they complete 3 runs
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to point
fraction short outside off stump, batsman glides it away to thirdman
full length ball on the leg stump, flicked away to deep square leg
DROPPED! fraction short just outside off stump, swinging away, Bell punches off the back-foot and gets the outside edge, goes low and a catchable height to Arnold, fails to catch it
defended on the back-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, driven on the front-foot to mid-off
fraction short on the off stump, Collingwood picks the length quickly and pulls it handsomely over mid-wicket fielder, ball runs away to the fence
defended on the front-foot to mid-on
on the middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep square leg
good length ball on the off stump, pushed off the front-foot to point
Brilliant fielding once more from DIlshan! good length ball outside off stump, batsman drives superbly on the front-foot but Dilshan dives across to his right at full stretch and fields it
defended on the front-foot to point, Dilshan picks and has a shy at the bowler's end, no one to back-up and they pick 2 runs
good length ball just outside off stump, good bounce off the wicket and batsman comprehensively beaten on the front-foot
defended on the back-foot to short cover and a single taken
short ball around the off stump, batsman drops it on the back-foot and scampers through a single
defended with an angled bat wide of the backward point fielder
slower one too short, Bell doesnt pick the slower one and plays for the bouncer but adjusts well to keep it out
flicked away to fine leg, Malinga misfields and batsmen quick to spot and they complete couple of runs
fraction short outside off stump, batsman mistimes the cut shot, ball rolls down to point region
flat on the stumps, defended on the front-foot to onside
low full toss, Collingwood takes it on the full and paddles to fine leg
full length ball on the off stump, swept away to deep square leg
tossed up a bit, batsman uses his feet and drives it down to long-on
turned away wide of the mid-wicket fielder, 4 runs taken off Bandara's 1st over
short ball on the off stump, batsman defends on the back-foot
short of length ball on the stumps, defended on the back-foot, Bell failing to rotate the strike
this time gets it  right, short one just outside off stump, steered away to thirdman
Collingwood comes down the track, Fernando doesnt give him the width, bowls on the length and batsman defends it away to offside
defended on the front-foot to short cover
good length ball on the off stump, not much Collingwood would do other than defend on the front-foot, ball rolls to offside and a good over from Fernando!
full length ball drifting into the pads, batsman pushes and gets on the pads
full toss on the leg stump, driven down to long-on
full length ball on the stumps, Collingwood turns it away to deep mid-wicket and looks for second run but Tharanga quick onto the ball
low full toss on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
given width outside off stump, turning away, batsman goes for the cut but fails to connect
down the legside, good work by Sangakkara
flat and full length ball on the off stump,driven back to the bowler
bouncer high and over the batsman, Benson has a look at the square leg Umpire Doctrove and then calls it a wide
defended on the back-foot down the wicket
short of length ball on the off stump, pushed to point
short delivery just outside off stump, batsman tries to steer but hits it straight to the gully fielder
good length ball on the off stump, Collingwood charges down the track and lofts it straight and wide of the mid-on fielder, excellent shot and eases some pressure
left alone outside off stump
Collingwood charges again and taps it away to mid-on and takes a quick single
fraction short on the leg stump, tucked away behind square and runs hard for two, Vaas runs in and throws at the bowler's end but they complete it easily
defended on the front-foot to offside
on the stumps, batsman uses his feet and drives straight to the mid-wicket fielder
turned away to sqaure leg
full toss on the off stump, batsman goes for the reverse sweep and gets a single wide of the backward point fielder
driven on the front-foot to long-on, Jayawardene dives across from mid-wicket but couldnt stop the ball
flighted ball outside leg stump, batsman tries to turn but gets on the pads
Run out missed! turned away to short fine leg, Arnold collects and fires in but way wide of Sangakkara, overthrow and they take an extra run
tossed up outside leg stump, turned away to square leg
glanced away behind square
on the leg stump, flicked away to deep mid-wicket

flighted and full length delivery on the off stump, Collingwood moves forward, drives uppishly and straight to Dilshan at cover, beaten by the flight, a  very soft dismissal and yet another English batsman throwing away his wicket after getting a start
full length ball outside off stump, driven to deep cover
fraction short outside off stump, batsman mistimes his cut shot to cover point, takes an easy single
yorker length ball on the stumps, batsman digs it out
pushed off the back-foot to offside
short ball and bowled a bit slow this time, batsman drives uppishly but wide of Bandara to long-off
full length ball on the leg stump, batsman tries to turn onside and gets the leading edge along the ground to offside
defended on the front-foot to onside
swept away to deep square leg
length ball on the off stump, pushed on the front-foot to point
pushed back to the bowler
length ball on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
full length ball on the legs, flicked away to deep square leg, 150 comes up
driven on the front-foot to long-off
flighted and full ball on the middle and leg stump, driven to long-on
driven to long-on on the front-foot
swept away to short-fine leg
beaten on the front-foot trying to drive
uses his feet and drives to long on for a single
driven to long on for another single
uses his feet and takes it on the full and plays to the midwicket fence, good shot, england looking to up the tempo
cut away to deep point, comes back for the second run
turned away to square leg for a single
tossed right up on the legs, looking to play to the on side, off the pad
spins wide and too short, cuts well behind point, ball races to the fence, well played, a welcome boundary
pushes to mid on
tossed up, plays it back to the bowler
turned away to midwicket, Jayawardene dives and makes a good stop
tossed right up in the block-hole, digs it out back down the track
pushes back down the track
driven to long on for a single
a full toss, Bell misses it, off the boot back down the track
driven to long off, one hand off the handle
cuts to backward-point, cannot get the single
on the legs, turned away behind square leg, comes quickly for the second run, good running
flat delivery, pushes to backward-point
uses his feet and drives well down the ground to long on
tossed right up outside the off stump, drives in the air, just short of Dilshan at short extra-cover
full toss, driven to long on for a single
uses his feet and takes it on the full and drives it back
uses his feet once again, looking to drive over the fielder, plays it back to the bowler
turned away to deep midwicket
takes it on the full and drives wide of long on for a single
well played, reverse sweeps well past the short thirdman to the deep, brings up Bell's 50
turned away to Jayawardene at midwicket
tossed right up, driven down the ground to long on
keeps low outside the off stump, plays and misses
uses his feet and takes it on the full and drives to long on
good strike from Dalrymple, uses his feet and lofts it high and over the long off fence, wonderful shot, excellent follow through after he hit the shot.
looks to reverse sweep, gets into a tangle, goes to the off side
waits for the ball and cuts late to short thirdman for a single
uses his feet well once again and takes it on the full and drives wide of long off, comes back for the second run, good running
fuller delivery, could not get under it well, drives to deep extra-cover, not a well timed shot
full and bit wide, pushes to the cover-point and takes a quick single, Dilshan running in cannot prevent the single
makes room and looks to go wide of Jayawardene at extra-cover, but cannot get through him
keeping it absolutely full, mistimes the shot to mid on
banged in short, Bell gets out of the way.
fuller delivery, drives it back well down the track, hits the stumps at the non-striker's end, deflects to extra-cover
drives well over the extra-cover to the fence, good strike from Dalrymple
low full toss, hits it wide of extra-cover to the fence, good shot
makes room and looks to play to the off side, runs it down to thirdman for a single
pushes to midwicket for a quick single, Jayawarden picks up the ball and has a shy at the stumps, misses it, that was a close thing
full and bit wide outside off stump, drives, gets the edge to thirdman fence
driven to long off for a single
Malinga picks up his second wicket, full and straight on the stumps, Dalrymple moves across to the off side and looks to lap it around, misses it completely, the ball knocks back the leg stump.
fast and straight, Jones defends softly to the off side, gets off the mark
full and on the legs, misses the tickle, brushes the pad and runs down to fine leg fence, a bad delivery from Malinga
wide outside the off stump, Bell cuts and misses, through to Sangakkara
full delivery, Bell looks to drive, gets a thickish inside edge, goes behind square leg, comes back for the second run, a bad throw from Bandara gets Bell the second run easily.
runs it down to thirdman for a single
pushes to long off for a single
good length delivery, Jones drives, gets the edge down to thirdman, fielded by Malinga
yorker length on the stumps, Bell makes room and looks to play through extra-cover, digs it out to the off side
fuller delivery, hits it well this time, driven wide of long off for a couple of runs, Vaas runs around and does well
extra bounce outside the off stump, looking to play it over the fielders, gets the edge to thirdman.
full and on the legs, Jones makes room, Fernando follows him, plays it well past the short fine leg to the fence.
good shot, full and straight, Bell hits it well down the track to long on, comes back for the second run
full and straight, Bell makes room and drives well to deep extra-cover, Maharoof fields the ball
makes room and this time pulls to midwicket and takes off for a quick single, Jayasuriya standing at the edge of the inner circle.
pushes to the off side for a single
smashed over the extra-cover, full and straight, Bell makes room and drives well in the air over the fielder to the fence, good shot

full and straight, driven to Jayawardene at extra-cover, who picks up the ball and scores a direct hit at the non-striker's end, referred to third Umpire for a run out. NOT OUT flashes on the screen, there was a doubt whether the bat was grounded or not.
makes room and cuts to point, they take the single
well played, moves to the on side and waits for the ball and glides it down past the keeper to thirdman fence
makes room again and drives to deep cover, Bandara dives across and makes a good stop.
short of length outside the off stump, this time Jones moves across to the off side and looks to play to the on side, misses it.
good length from Fernando, yorker dug out to the on side, they scamper through for a single
driven down the ground to long off for a single
full and straight, Bell makes room, gets the edge to short fine leg, well bowled Malinga
good ball and well played, on the yorker length, wonderfully dug out past the short fine leg to the fence.
moves across to the off side, dug out on the track, quick single taken
fuller delivery, driven hard straight back down the track, Malinga stops it well on his follow through
excellent delivery, keeping it full, misses the leg stump, goes to Sangakkara behind the stumps.

RUN OUT! full ball, Bell makes room and drives in the air to deep point, Maharoof quickly picks up the ball and throws it in to the striker's end, Sangakkara collects it and whips off the bails, referred to the third Umpire, OUT flashes on the screen, Bell is just short of the crease.
another RUN OUT! Louden goes, Jones drives to long off, goes for the second run, Dilshan quickly picks up the ball and throws to Fernando, who runs out Louden, he was a long way off the crease.
pushes to the off side for a single
full toss above knee, Plunkett does well to play to fine leg fence.
full and straight, Plunkett drives it back to Fernando, who half stops it, they take the single
full toss outside the off stump, moves across and pushes to long off, Dilshan fields the ball and fires in the throw

good length delivery, looks to go over the in field, gets an inside edge on to the pads, ball rolls away past the stumps to Sangakkara behind the wicket, they scamper through for a single, picks up the ball and has a shy at the stumps, misses it,

inn2.comm: good length ball on the leg stump, batsman tries to flick and gets on the pads
fraction short on the middle and leg stump, defended on the back-foot to onside
short ball on the middle stump, defended on the back-foot to gully
short delivery on the leg stump, moving away and lifts off, batsman beaten completely on the back-foot
good length ball on the off stump, moving away, Tharanga moves forward and glides down with the swing to thirdman, Tharanga off the mark
fraction short and moving away outside off stump, Jayasuriya cuts but not from the middle of the bat, good fielding by Dalrymple at short point
fraction short on the middle and leg stump, moving away, batsman adjusts well and keeps it out, ball rolls to offside
length ball on the leg stump, turned away to mid-on region and looks for a single but Jayasuriya not interested
defended on the front-foot, very well played by Tharanga
on the middle and leg stump, turned away to mid-wicket
good length ball on the off stump, batsman drives on the up straight down the ground to long-off region, Pietersen does the chase
Max! short and wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya on top of it and smashes over the point fence, his favourite shot!
short ball angled away outside off stump, Tharanga cuts it hard but good fielding by Collingwood saves a certain boundary
left alone outside off stump
Four more! short ball just outside off stump, swinging away, Jayasuriya quick to pick the length, goes back and lofts it over cover, one bounce into the fence
this time not given much of room, defended on the back-foot to point
short one down the legside, Jayasuriya looks to glance but the extra bounce takes off the gloves and runs down fine to the fence, good start for the Lankans!
fraction short on the leg stump, batsman looks to glance and gets on the pads, ball rolls down to offside
defended on the back-foot down the wicket
fraction short on the middle and leg stump, nipping away, Tharanga defends nicely on the back-foot
good length ball just outside off stump,  swinging away, Tharanga looks to drive on the up and gets beaten
good length ball straying on the pads, Tharanga flicks it off beautifully through mid-wicket, that was a top shot which shows his form in the series
Four more! fuller length ball outside off stump, Tharanga drives through extra-cover fence, amazing start from the Lankans!
defended on the front-foot to mid-off
short of length ball outside off stump, swinging away, batsman looks to punch but the ball keeps a bit low, gets beaten
Poor bowling, short one outside off stump again, Jayasuriya smashes it over point fielder and one bounce into the fence, feeding Jayasuriya to his strength&
short one on the leg stump, tucked away to fine leg
good length ball around the off stump, Tharanga defends and gets the outside edge to thirdman
good length ball, this time straightens and lifts off, batsman beaten comprehensively on the front-foot
short of length ball given width outside off stump, Jayasuriya just goes back and smashes through covers, this is really very poor bowling from Harmison
defended on the back-foot to point

fraction short on the stumps, Tharanga gets an inside edge and ball rolls to short-leg region, Jayasuriya calls for a single but Mahmood was quick to the ball, picks and uproots the stumps, Jayasuriya dives in but is found short,  TV Umpire makes the decision
defended on the back-foot to offside
length ball straying onto the pads, Jayawardene flicks it off his legs to backward square leg fence
short ball just outside off stump, batsman rocks back and punches but straight to the point fielder
defended on the back-foot to square leg
Jayawardene makes room and cuts it away straight to the point fielder, this is strange batting from the skipper as he has just walked into the middle
short of length ball on the off stump, defended on the back-foot to point
short and wide outside off stump, Tharanga smashes high and over the point fielder
defended on the back-foot to mid-on, Jayawardene looks for a single but sent back, not a clean pick up from Loudon at mid-on
fraction short on the middle stump and moving away, batsman beaten on the back-foot
driven on the up wide of the mid-off fielder and takes a quick single
left alone outside off stump
defended on the back-foot to point
short on the pads, glanced away nicely to fine leg
length ball straying on the pads, Jayawardene flicks it off with authority through mid-wicket fence
Four more! short ball outside off stump, Jayawardene looks to punch on the back-foot, edges but no slip in place, flies to the thirdman fence
Hat-trick of boundaries! straying on the pads again, one more flick and one more boundary, this time wide of the fine leg fielder
again on the pads, batsman flicks but this time straight to the fine leg fielder
driven on the front-foot to mid-off
short of length ball on the stumps, defended on the back-foot to mid-on
turned away straight to square leg fielder
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts it away to the deep point fence, Lankans going strong!
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven through extra-covers for a couple of runs, not a well-timed shot!
good length ball around the off stump, defended solidly on the front-foot to offside
bouncer directed well, Tharanga ducks underneath, Jones fails to collect a straight forward ball
Amazing shot! good length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene drives beautifully through cover fence, right from the middle of the bat and ball races away to the fence. excellent timing in that shot!
on the middle and leg stump, flicked away through mid-wicket for a couple of runs
full toss on the leg stump, batsman fails for the first time to put away a bad ball
tucked away behind square and an easy single taken
bouncer, batsman ducks underneath
fuller length ball on the middle stump, Tharanga drives back to the bowler
steered down to thirdman
good length ball given width outside off stump, Tharanga smashes on the front-foot to cover point fence, lovely shot!
short of length ball just outside off stump, batsman tries to steer and gets an inside edge to gully
short ball outside off stump, glided down to thirdman
Four more to end the over! short ball outside off stump, angled in, Tharanga deliberately slashes and ball takes off the edge, flies to thirdman fence
defended on the back-foot to onside
defended on the front-foot to cover
turned away to mid-wicket fielder
good length ball on the off stump, defended and probably he wil be the first bowler today to have bowled 4 dot balls
defended on the front-foot and this is good bowling from the medium pacer
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg and prevents the first maiden over of the match
on the pads, glanced away to deep square leg
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven wide of the mid-off fielder through extra-cover for a couple of runs
pushed to mid-off and scampers through a single
down the legside, glanced away wide of the short-fine leg fielder and ball races away to the fence
Four more! short delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts it behind square and ball reaches the point fence, runs continuing to flow here!
driven straight to mid-on
short one down the legside, Tharanga pulls it away wide of the short-fine leg fielder, boundary to start the over
short of length ball outside off stump, batsman cuts and misses
defended on the front-foot down the wicket
fuller length ball outside off stump, Tharanga drives beautifully through extra-covers and ball races away
on the pads, batsman fails to put it away and gets on the pads
defended on the back-foot to offside
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts it away in the air and just over outstretched hands of Collingwood at backward point
defended on the back-foot
good length ball outside off stump, Jaywardene defends and gets the outside edge to thirdman fence, reaches his fifty off just 40 balls!
fuller length ball way outside off stump, slashed away in the air, one bounce to the thirdman fielder
half-volley outside off stump, driven superbly on the front-foot but good fielding at short cover stops a certain boundary
turned away to the onside
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven to long-off
good length ball outside off stump, glided down fine and Pietersen at thirdman limps and fields
defended on the front-foot
fuller length ball, driven down the ground to long-on
played to the midwicket
swept away to deep backward square leg for a single
defended to the off side on the front foot
Dalrymple strikes, a much needed wicket, the wicket of Tharanga, who sweeps, gets the top edge to short fine leg, Strauss moves across and takes the catch.
turned away to the on side, fielder in quickly prevents the single
defends well with a straight bat down the track
pushes to mid on
good length delivery, defends with a straight bat down the track
good shot, waits for it and cuts it late past the backward-point to the fence, the thirdman could not get across
pushes to mid off, sharp single taken to Strauss
slower delivery moves away, beats the outside edge
back of a length, Sangakkara flicks it to square leg for a single
comes forward and defends to the off side
moves back and pushes to mid off
excellent delivery, spins away, beats the outside edge
slower through the air, comes forward and defends down the track.
good ball, gets the edge, just short of Trescothick at first slip
comes forward and defends to the off side
tossed up, pushes it back to Loudon
sweeps well behind square leg to the deep
moves back and turns it around to midwicket for a single
good flighted delivery, Jayawardene pushes it back to the bowler
turns it around behind square leg to the deep
tossed up outside the off stump, Sangakkara pushes down the ground to long off for a single
comes forward and defends watchfully to the off side
moves back and punches down the ground to long off for a single.
slower through the air, comes forward and nudges behind square leg
turned away to midwicket
a touch short, Jayawardene on the back foot , looking to play to the on side, gets an inside edge on to the pads and then rolls just past the leg stump
squares drives to deep point for a single
cut away to deep point
good flighted delivery outside the off stump, pushes to short extra-cover
pushes to cover for a single
moves forward and turns it around behind square leg for a single
pushes it back down the track
flighted delivery, giving a good loop, Sangakkara pushes back down the track.
flat delivery outside the off stump, turned nicely to short fine leg, Plunkett dives and makes a good stop, saved a few runs.
moves back and defends to cover, fielded by Mahmood
turned away to midwicket for a single
spins way down leg, signalled wide by Umpire Benson
nudges to deep backward square leg for a single
tossed up outside the leg stump, swept to short fine leg
moves back and drives to deep cover for a single
spins in from outside the off stump, pushes to the off side for a single
turned away to short fine leg
pushes it back down the track, Loudon does well
a touch short, Jayawardene moves back and turns it through midwicket
driven back to the bowler
waits on the back foot and turns it around behind square leg for a single
turned away to square leg
comes forward and turns it behind square leg
spins in from outside the off stump, off the pad to the on side
spins down leg, signalled wide
flat delivery tossed right up, driven to long on
tossed up on the leg stump, spins across, beats the bat, off the pad to fine leg
flicked in the air to deep square leg for a single
a long hop, Jayawardene fails to put it away, hits it straight to midwicket
off the pad to the off side
drifts on the legs, brushes the pad to fine leg
quicker delivery, played to the on side
works it nicely to midwicket for a single
tossed up outside the off stump, comes forward and drives well down the ground to long off for an easy single
turned away to short fine leg
a touch short, works it to deep backward square leg
comes forward and defends with a straight bat
a touch short, moves back and pushes to long off
quicker delivery pushed through, Jayawardene looking to cut, misses it
down the leg side, tickles it nicely to fine leg fence
down the leg side, flicked off his legs to deep backward square leg for a single
short delivery, Jayawardene pulls around to square leg for a single.
short delivery, Sangakkara looking to cut, gets beaten, through to Jones
short delivery down the leg side, tucks it off his hips to fine leg for a single
turned away to the on side
pace and bounce, width offered, it was quick for Jayawardene, who was looking for the cut shot, misses it, through to Jones
comes forward and taps it to the on side for a single
short ball, Jayawardene plays to square leg
tossed up, this time Jayawardene picks it up and hits it high to deep midwicket, one bounce into the fence
turned to midwicket
played to short fine leg
down the leg side, Sangakkara flicks it to fine leg
defended off the back foot to the off side
good length delivery, drives it upishly to mid off
fuller delivery, pushes it back down the track, half stopped by Harmison
fuller delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene drives well but finds the fielder at short cover
back of a length, pushes to mid on
comes forward and takes it on the pad
moves back and punches to mid off
defends on the back foot to the off side
comes forward and plays to short thirdman
a touch short, moves back and pushes to mid off for a single
comes forward and sweeps behind square leg to the deep
short and wide outside the off stump, Jayawardene slashes hard, goes in the air wide of thirdman, Bell runs around and makes a good save
defends off the back foot behind the wicket to backward-point
back of a length, Sangakkara pushes to mid off and takes off for a quick single
play and a miss outside the off stump, good length delivery outside the off stump, moves away off the seam, Jayawardene goes for the big drive, misses, through to Jones.
quick single taken on the on side
pushes to mid off to end the over.
tossed up, Jayawardene charges down the track and lofts it straight and wide of the mid-on fielder
Four more! fraction short and spinning into the leg stump, Jayawardene pulls it away to squa re leg fence
length ball on the off stump, batsman tries to turn and gets the leading edge along the gound to offside
pushed off the back-foot to cover, Sangakkara wants the single but sent by Jayawardene
driven wide of the mid-on fielder
defended on the back-foot to point
fraction short outside off stump, punched straight to the cover fielder
pushed off the back-foot through covers for a couple of runs and moves onto 98
short of length ball just outside off stump, coming in, defended back to the bowler

Amazing shot to bring up an excellent century! good length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene drives on the up through the line and finds the gap through extra-cover, ball races away to the fence and Jayawardene celebrates his 7th century!
left alone outside off stump
on the pads, Sangakkara glances and misses, gets on the pads and rolls to square leg
punched on the back-foot straight down the wicket, mid-on fielder runs across and fields
bouncer high and over outside off stump, called a wide
fuller length ball on the leg stump, flicked away to deep backward square leg
half-volley outside off stump, Sangakkara drives wide of the mid-off fielder, poor fielding from Bell and they take a couple of runs
down the legside, ball clips the pads on the way to the keeper
short and wide outside off stump, cut away in the air to deep point
slower one on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes and gets the leading edge, falls short of the bowler
length ball on the leg stump, turns it away to mid-wicket and runs hard to complete a couple of runs
short ball on the middle and leg stump, glanced away to fine leg
short ball outside off stump, Jayawardene pulls but not from the middle of the bat, ball passes over the mid-wicket fielder for a couple of runs
glanced away to deep backward sqaure leg
slower one around the off stump, Sangakkara beaten on the front-foot
short ball on the stumps, Jayawardene makes room and cuts it but straight to the point fielder
full toss on the stumps, glanced away to deep square leg
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven to deep cover, excellent running between the wicket fetches them two runs
bouncer down the legside, no-ball called for overstepping
bowls a slower one following the bouncer, Sangakkara spots it and defends it on the front-foot to cover
short on the pads, Sangakkara pulls but gets on the pads
Jaywardene charges down the track, high full toss and batsman defends it down the wicket
length ball on the stumps, defended on the front-foot
down the legside, ball clips the pads and rolls to onside, batsmen scamper through a single
slower one outside off stump, Jaywardene tries to loft over mid-off but gets beaten
length ball on the stumps, Jayawardene moves onside and scoops to fine leg fence, excellent control in that shot!
driven straight down the ground for a couple of runs
short ball outside off stump, mistimed cut to point region
short of length ball on the stumps, turned away to onside
Good shot! short ball banged in, Jayawardene rocks back and pulls it away in the air to deep backward square leg fence
fraction short outside off stump, Jayawardene punches and gets the edge to thirdman
short ball on the leg stump, Sangakkara pulls in the air to fine leg, Darlymple runs in and dives but ball falls short of the fielder, bounces over him into the fence
turned away to mid-wicket
flighted and full ball outside leg stump, Sangakkara sweeps it away to the fine leg fence, runs flowing here and Lankans looking to finish off soon
Four more! tossed up on the leg stump, Sangakkara charges down the track and drives straight to long-on fence
glanced away to behind square and an easy single taken
defended on the back-foot to onside
on the pads, worked away behind square
tossed up outside off stump, Sangakkara steps out and lofts over mid-off fielder, 14 runs of the over
pitched up outside off stump, driven to deep cover
short ball on the middle and leg stump, defended to mid-wicket
short of length ball on the leg stump, glanced away to fine leg
defended on the back-foot to short mid-wicket, Jayawardene calls for a single but sent back by Sangakkara
on the leg stump, turned away to mid-wicket
good length ball on the off stump, pushed on the front-foot to point
spins down leg, signalled wide
tossed up, uses his feet and swings it in the air to midwicket fence, good shot from Jayawardene
turned away behind square leg
tossed up, driven to long off for a single
driven to long on for a single
pushes to long on for a single
the doosra, spins away, pushes to the off side
short ball, Sangakkara  goes for the pull, misses it, through to Jones
wide outside the off stump, Sangakkara goes after it, misses it, signalled wide
All over!, down the leg side, Sangakkara flicks it to backward square leg fence, good shot
